document.full_text: ben hogan was quite successful after a car accident led him to reduce his playing schedule, and the much-injured tiger woods might benefit from playing less in an effort to win more.
document.title: on golf: to win more, perhaps woods should play less
lines_and_colors: ben hogan was quite successful after a car accident led him to reduce his playing schedule, and the much-injured tiger woods might benefit from playing less in an effort to win more.
